name: Rally Car Simulator
description:
The newest car driving simulator game of 2020 with the most realistic driving physics,customization,open world,racing tracks,different game modes and more!

★REAL DRIVING PHYSICS
Rally Car Simulator has the best and the realism driving physics to create the best experience driving simulator.Every vehicles has their own physics!


★CUSTOMIZATION
You can customize your car as you want by changing the color of the HUD, the smoke of the wheels, the color of the headlights, lifting the wheels on the front or back and much more.
Create your own dream car with Rally Car Simulator.


★GAME MODES
Rally Car Simulator is waiting for you with two basic game modes (and not only):

•FREE RIDE - Test your car and its limits by exploring the various maps. There are different maps for each person (for those who love the view of the mountain, for those who love to drift through the cities, to do off-road, etc.)

•RACING - Earn money by competing the race (each car has its own bonus).You will find different maps where you can drive like a professional racing driver together with your favorite car.New maps will be added regularly!


★BEHAVIORS TYPE
•SIMULATOR
•RACING
•DRIFT
•SEMI ARCADE
•FUN

★GAME CONTROLS
You can select several game controls for a unique Rally Car Simulator experience:
-Steering Wheel
-Buttons
-Tilt
-Manual Transmission with clutch


★PLAY GROUNDS
Each map has its own stunt place where you can have fun with your favorite car.
